1.content:
Let's start off with some scenarios.

1. Monika finally makes it to the real world, but something is off, now she's continually growing.

2. Monika messed with the code of the game, now one or even all of the girls are growing, or you are shrinking.

3. You suddenly find the Doki's passed out in your home. After making sure their okay, you notice they appear to be getting taller.

4. It seem you've discovered the power to change people's size, and you use it to mess with the Doki's.
1.title: Doki Doki

11.content:
It had been about a month since you've completed Doki Doki Literature Club. To say the least, this game held a special place in your heart. It was short, at least in comparison to other games you had played in the past. However, the writing was phenomenal, easily leaving you very attached to the characters. You sympathized with their struggles, felt joy when you saw them happy and felt sad what you had witnessed the girls go through during the second act.

Watching Yuri's obsession grow out of control, seeing Natsuki's dad become more abusive, witnessing Sayori's death, and seeing just how lonely Monika was. You wished there was more to the game, and that you could help each and every girl, but the best you could have done was of course get the good end, trying your best to make everyone happy.

In the month that has past, you've considered going back to the game just for the hell of it, but you've always decided against it. Something just didn't feel right about replaying the game again, maybe it just felt like you would be making the girls suffer again? You weren't sure.

Right now though, you were busy fixing yourself a meal, totally unaware of what was happening with your computer. Small sparks were shooting out from the monitor and computer, small and far apart at first, but slowly growing in intensity. It wasn't until it really started getting bad that you finally took notice of it, right when you finished preparing your food too.

"What is-" you begin making your way to your computer, but stop midway once you see just how bad the situation really is. Fearing the worst, you do the best thing you can think of; hide behind your couch. The sparks grow worse and worse, until finally-

"Yah-!" A feminine voice cries, a girl crashing into the wall opposite from the computer, having been launched out of the monitor. You witnessed this from behind the couch, finally emerging once you feel as though it was safe to come out.

"Is that... Monika?" You state in disbelief, said Monika currently rubbing her head where it had slammed into the wall. Thankfully, she didn't appear to be too hurt at the very least. Finally, she looked up to you, her emerald eyes meeting yours. She froze, seemingly in disbelief herself. After a minute, she look around, scanning her surroundings.

"Did... did it work?" She finally asked, confirming that she was no longer in the Literature Club, looking back up at you.

"Did what work?" You asked. Slowly, you see a smile appear on her face as she picks herself up, rising to her full height, which happened to be just a little shorter than yourself, about three inches shorter than you, putting her at about 5'3".

"It... it worked. It worked!" She suddenly cried out, running to you and enveloping you in a hug, crying tears of joy. You are taken back by this sudden sequence of events, but eventually you return the hug, gently patting her on the back in an attempt to console her.

This was going to be an interesting night...
11.title: Just Monika

choices: In the middle of the night.
111.content:
After a nearly 5 minute crying session and almost a whole tissue box, Monika seems to have finally calmed down. Right now, you and Monika were sitting together on the couch, both taking in the current situation. Monika was looking around the room, taking in the new setting. You however, you couldn't take your eyes off of her.

Even if she seemed to be self aware in the game, you knew it was just all part of the meta aspect. At least, you think you knew now. This all seemed like a dream. Monika, a girl from a video game was now here, in the flesh, in your house! Suddenly, she locked eyes with you once more, a small blush appearing on her face.

"Oh! I'm sorry. I'm still trying to get used to all this. It's just... different. So different." She said, leaning back onto the couch. "I've just grown used to the game world. Seeing the classroom everyday, the same three girls, the scripts, the code, all of it. It's surreal being here, in the real world... with you." She looked back at you, her eyes soft.

"No. I get it. It's new to both of us." You say, looking away. "I'm still trying to process this as well. How are you here anyway?" You asked. Monika put a finger to her chin, seemingly in thought.

"Well... I'm not sure. Ever since you... deleted me," you and Monika both seem to cringe at the memory. "let's just say I had a lot of time to go through the codes. So I decided to poke around a bit more, mostly because I had nothing better to do. Eventually, I found... something, I'm not entirely sure what it was. After I tried activating it, I ended up here. That's all I can really recall." She said, rubbing the back of her head. You doubt you'll get anymore than that from her, because if she didn't know what happened, then there's no way you'll be finding answers anytime soon.

"I see, what about the others?" You asked.

"I'm not entirely sure, they might still be in there." Monika suddenly let out a cute little yawn.

"I'm sorry, I didn't realize how tired I was. Is there... some place I can sleep the night. And maybe... every other night, hehe?" She said with a nervous chuckle. As far as you were concerned, you didn't mind her staying here with you.

"Oh, yeah. I can set up the couch here for you. Do you want to change? I can get some pajamas for you. They might be a little big, but I'm sure they'll be more comfortable than sleeping in your school uniform." You say. Monika looks down at herself, seeming to have forgotten that she was still in the clothing from the game.

"Yes please, I'd appreciate it." She smiled.

"Alright. We can go shopping tomorrow for clothes so you aren't stuck with just a single outfit." You say, and she nodded in response. After all the preparations were finished, Monika had a place to sleep with clothes to sleep in. Said clothes were quite big on her, the pajama pants were long enough to more than cover her feet. You said goodnight to her and headed off to your own bed, turning the lights off for her as you left.

As Monika got comfortable, she couldn't shake this strange feeling she had ever since she got here. She couldn't describe it any other way than... unnatural. She shrugged it off as best she could though, thinking she could worry about it tomorrow. However, unbeknownst to her, the clothes she was currently wearing fit her just a little bit better as she slowly grew a single inch in height.
111.title: New world, new feeling.

choices: After the trip to the store.
Checking in on the other Dokis.
1111.content:
"Slow down, I've never seen you this excited." You say, doing your best to keep up with the seemingly now energetic girl. She was essentially jumping back and forward between clothes, seeing what was cute, what she liked, etc. "Also don't grab to many now, I can't buy out the whole store. Plus you still need shoes too, don't forget." You note, as she hadn't moved on from the pants yet.

"I know! But not only do I get to explore your world, but this is like a date!" She said happily. You chuckled, rolling your eyes.

"Good to see that you haven't changed. But, uh, keep talk about 'my world' on the down low out in public. People are going to stare if you keep that up." You say, which made Monika realize her mistake.

"Hehe, yeah, you're right." She rubbed the back of her head with her free hand. "Anyway, I think I've picked out all my clothes." She said, walking over to you, showing you her choices. One pair was a blue long sleeved shirt with gray pants, another was a simple white dress that was still pretty casual. The third was a t-shirt of a cute cat and shorts, finally, there was pink pajamas for her to sleep in. You looked over them a little surprised.

"That's it? Not just a few more?" You asked, you were expected a little more.

"That's it, I don't want to make you spend too much on me" She said, looking away with a small smile. How is she so cute? You smiled back at her.

"Well, alright, if you're sure. Do you want to go look at shoes now? I can hold you clothes while you do." You offered, gaining a bigger smile from her.

"Such a gentleman." She giggled. As you gathered her soon to be clothes from her, you told her to go on ahead to the shoe section as you got control of the clothes. She nodded and walked on ahead. Once you could properly hold all the clothes, you headed over as well, expecting to meet her at the shoes, but instead, you found her looking down at herself, confused with a hand to her chest.

"Monika, are you okay?" You asked concerned. She blinked, looking towards you.

"Oh, yes, I'm fine. It's nothing." She said. "What about we walk together?" She suggested. You didn't want to pry if it really was nothing. You agreed and began your walk to the shoe section. Monika attempted to be sly and try to link her hand with your free one, gaining another eye roll from you as she lightly blushed. You looked over to her, she was avoiding eye contact and... was she always that tall? You had guessed she had been 5'3" last night, but now she looked to be at least 5'5" now. Maybe you misjudged her height initially. Whatever the case may be, it was not anything to worry about.
1111.title: Shopping trip.

choices: Something happens to the three girls.
11113.content:
"Sorry! I'm late again!" Sayori cried out, rushing into the classroom, seemingly out of breath. As the coral pink haired girl regained her composer, she finally took a look at the state of the club. It wasn't well, Yuri was by herself reading another horror book and Natsuki was sitting in the floor near the closet, manga in hand. Yuri, only now realizing that there was another person in the room, looked up from her book and looked over to Sayori.

"Oh, hello Sayori. It is alright, it... doesn't seem to matter too much." She stated, the sadness present in her voice. Natsuki simply shifted uncomfortably, bothered by the state of the club as much as Yuri.

"Oh..." Sayori sullenly sighed, "Monika isn't here?" She asked. Natsuki was the one to respond this time.

"She hasn't been at school at all." She stated bluntly. "Neither has [MC]." She turned the page of her manga, gaining a gasp from the slightly taller girl.

"You don't think-!" She implied, shock overtaking her face. Yuri was tempted to roll her eyes.

"I doubt it. She's the perfect student. She wouldn't sully that by running off with a boy away from school."

"She better not. I doubt she'd even fall for someone as dumb as him." Natsuki blurted out.

"Natsuki! Don't be mean!" Sayori cried. This gained a small chuckle from the tall purple haired girl. She was always grateful for Sayori's presence, her innocence could always help lighten the mood. Even Natsuki couldn't help but smile a bit too. Sayori, seemingly sensing that the atmosphere had shifted, smiled herself.

"Yay! Everyone is happy again!" She cheered.

"Well, not exactly, but we are both thankful for you being here." Yuri said with a smile. Natsuki made a small noise in agreement, not wanting to make her agreement vocal. "That being said, since you are here, do you two want to share poems now."

"Might as well," Natsuki said, putting her manga away and getting up. "... Yuri, do you want to exchange poems first?" She asked looking away, catching the taller girl by surprise.

"M-me?" She stuttered.

"And you two are getting along too! I'm so glad!" Sayori exclaimed, running over to hug Natsuki, the smaller girl getting flustered.

"Sh-shut up! I just thought... I'd get some advice from her.." She stated, this in turn made the taller girl become embarrassed too.

"O-oh gosh, I-I'm not that good, but if you want to." She responded, playing with her hair. Sayori couldn't help but smile more at the situation. Even if they were missing two members, she was still going to try and make this an enjoyable experience for everyone.
11113.title: Back at the literature club.

choices: "You were making homework, you're so smart!"
"Who cares. I will place you somewhere comfortable"
1112.content:
Monika's sleep went uninterrupted for quite sometime until she felt herself slightly shifting on the couch underneath her. The sensation didn't seem noticeable or that out of the ordinary at first, probably just her still being shaken by the joy of seeing you again, but the feeling went from minor to major when Monika felt her legs stretch beyond the edge of the couch.

Awake as she could be, Monika went to bathroom next to your room to properly check on herself. Immediately she noticed that the overly large pajamas now fitted her almost flawless, with her feet now clearly being visible. This was quite unusual since she had never programmed herself to be capable of this, nor would that be possible outside of the literature club.

She quickly put on her original outfit and noticed that her body now seemed a lot more.... exaggerated. Her curves were beyond the charts (at least she thinks so). A wide smile spread across her face at this realization, the thought of your surprised and dumbfounded face made her already sweat in pleasure. As quick as lightning strikes, Monika had already entered your room.

Right away from the doorway, she saw you sleeping at your desk with your desk lamp still turned on. Along with her hight and wide smile, her desire for you only kept grew with her every step she took towards you until she stood right behind while you remained asleep.

She then took a seat at the other side of the desk and began stroking her elegant fingers of her right hand through your hair as she kept her chin up with her left. A strong feeling of déjà vu had come over Monika, but she didn't mind nor could've she cared less about that; you're with her, that all that mattered.

"Aren't you just sooo cute when you sleep?"

Eventually Monika finally noticed what things were on your desk
1112.title: Sudden wake up

11122.content:
She saw some school stuff but she also looked around and saw your bed, so with her ability to move things with her mind (since she is part cyber space), she moved you to your bed and tucked you in.

She kissed you goodnight and turned off the lights and left you alone
11122.title: "Who cares. I will place you somewhere comf...

12.content:
“Hi again MC! Glad to see you didn’t run away on us. Hahaha!” Monika greeted you with a sweet smile, as you walked into the club room.

“Nah, don't worry, This might be a little strange for me, but I at least keep my word!” you reply, putting down your backpack, as Monika walks off to continue her conversation with Sayori. you were the last one in, so everyone else was already hanging out, and you didn’t really know what to do until Yuri came over to talk.

“Thanks again for keeping your promise MC, I hope this isn't too overwhelming of a commitment for you, making you dive headfirst into literature when you're not accustomed to it…” she mumbled the ending, looking down as she twisted her shoe into the ground nervously.

“Oh, come on! Like he deserves any slack” Natsuki shouts, butting into the conversation, “ Sayori told me you didn’t even want to join any clubs this year, and last year too, I don't know if you plan to just come here and hang out or what, but if you don't take us seriously, then you won’t hear the end of it!” she finished shouting, stamping her foot down on the floor over and over again.

“Natsuki,” Monika interjects. “You certainly have a big mouth for someone who keeps their manga collection in the club room”

Natuski stutters, finding herself stuck between saying “Monika!” and “Manga!”

“Manga is literature!” she finally shouts, yet swiftly defeated, she plops back into her seat.

“Don't worry guys,” Sayori pipes up “MC always gives it his best as long as he’s having fun, he helps me with busywork without me even asking, like cooking cleaning my room…”

“How dependable…” Yuri quietly whispers

“Sayori,” you start to say “That’s because your room is so messy its distracting, and you almost set your house on fire once!”

“Tee-hee” Sayori giggles, jumping up and down on her toes, but then her facial expression changed suddenly as if she just remembered something “Oh oh! Yuri brought something for you today you know~”

“W-wait! Sayori!”

"Eh? Me?"

"Um... Not really..."

"What is it?"

"Sayori made it sound like a big deal when it's really not… Uuuuh, what do I do..."

As you were giggling at yuri’s timidness, you suddenly felt a sharp pain in your stomach, you could barely focus on what was being said anymore, looking around, trying to see each of the girls, you see Yuri trying to bury her face in her hair, Sayori calmly watching her, Natsuki reading manga, and Monika, who was doing something you couldn’t quite figure out, standing up straight, eyes closed, focusing on something really hard, before the world around you started spinning, and then tilting, until you hit your head on the floor, and everything went black…

Your vision comes back to you slowly, as you open your eyes and put your hand on the side of your head, you look at the floor, wooden panels that stretch out for miles, as you gradually look up, you see metal rods that are high as skyscrapers, you can't figure out what mystical land you are in, until a giant thud comes from behind you, seeing a giant shoe before you, slightly further up is the leg of the owner of the shoe, even further up you look until you’re almost looking up 90 degrees, seeing the face of __ as you begin to panic, realizing what had happened to you...
12.title: Scenario 2

15.content:
1. Something goes awry, now you're shrinking, only thing is that the only people who notice the change in size are you and the Doki's!

2. Love is a strange thing. As you grow closer to the Doki's, they will grow in proportion to their affection.

3. Monika wants to make things interesting for you this time around. She's decided to make the girls grow, herself included, with only you and her noticing anything different.

4. In this branch, you'll be focusing on one Doki that grows, or you shrink.
15.title: Other scenarios.

choices: The club continues as normal as possible.
Monika, worried about the situation, calls the club off early. (Reserved)
151.content:
“Shit, my head…” You say, clutching your head as you lean against a nearby locker. Some passing students glance towards you, but pay you no mind as they continue on with their business. As soon as the headache appeared, it just as quickly disappeared without a trace. You lift your hand from your head once you feel the pain subside. “What the hell…” You question, confused as to why the pain was suddenly gone. “Well, whatever, I should get to the literature club.” Once making sure that you’re alright, you make your way through the crowd towards the class where the literature club was located.

“Oh hey, it still surprises me to see you coming back.” Natsuki commented once you entered into the class.

“Nice to see you too, Natsuki.” You lightly waved.

“Are you alright, you don’t look so good.” Yuri, asked, standing up from her desk, of course not without saving her spot in her book.

“Huh, oh, yeah, I’m fine. I just got a migraine on the way here.”

“What? That’s not good!” Yuri exclaimed, surprisingly loudly. Was she really that worried about you? Even Natsuki seemed worried, though she quickly changed the look on her face once she saw you were looking, turning away with a ‘hmph’. Yuri seems to have realized what she did, and looked away shyly. “I-I’m sorry. I was just worried.”

“I-It’s alright Yuri. I already feel fine anyway.” You say in an attempt to dispel her worries.

“I-is that so?” She asks, glancing at you. While you two were talking, Natsuki seemed to have noticed something about you.

“Hey, is Yuri taller than you?” She asked, walking up to you both.

“Huh?” You both say in unison.

“Stand back to back for a second.” Natsuki almost commands.

“W-what?!” Yuri’s face gains a shade of red, seemingly flustered.

“Don’t make this weird!” Natsuki rolled her eyes. “Just do it.” Though a bit reluctant, the purple haired girl complied, turning so that he back is against yours. You wait for Natsuki’s verdict. After a moment, she grumbles.

“Hold on, let me get onto a chair.” She said, mumbling something about you and Yuri, probably about your heights dwarfing hers. Once on a desk chair, she can finally tell. “Yeah, Yuri’s taller than you.” She says, causing Yuri to once again turn red, she always did seem shy about her height.

“T-that can’t be right though…” She says. “I remember having to look up to him last week…” She says. You could confirm that she was right too, remember how you had at least 2 inches on her. But if what Natsuki was saying was right, that would either mean Yuri was taller than 6 feet now, or you had some how shrunk at least 3 inches. You turn around, looking Yuri in the eye. Natsuki was right, you found yourself having to look slightly above to meet her gaze.

“How…” Is all you can say. After a moment, Natsuki’s voice fills in.

“Like you need to be any taller, Yuri!” She pouts. I guess it would be jealous inducing if the tallest person only got taller while you stayed the shortest.

“I-it’s not I want it to be this way…” Yuri sighs. Feeling a bit bad, you go to put a hand on her shoulder, until you accidentally shock her. She yelps in surprise.

“Sorry!” You exclaim. “I didn’t mean to!”

“N-no, it’s alright.” She says, looking away. Looking forward, you see Natsuki gaping at something.

“Natsuki?”

“Did… did Yuri just get even taller?” She questioned. You raise a brow before turning towards Yuri. But what you see shocked you. Yuri somehow did get taller! Even she noticed it. Another moment of awkward silence fills the room as you three stand in shock. Eventually, Natsuki jumps off the chair and heads to the closet, rummaging around a bit.

“There it is.” She says, pulling out a measuring tape.

“N-Natsuki?” Yuri asks.

“Hey, help me measure Yuri.” Natsuki says towards you. You glance towards the girl in question, shrugging as she meets your gaze. Both of you head towards the pink haired girl. Yuri is told to stand up against the wall, which she complies. After receiving the measuring tape and taking Yuri’s height, you stand shocked.

“Well?” Natsuki asked. Even Yuri was curious to know.

“6’2”” You inform them.

“I-I grew 4 inches…?” Yuri seemingly asks the question everyone has on their mind. After even more stunned silence, Natsuki speaks up.

“Let’s check your height too.” She says. Complying, you hand the measuring tape to Yuri and stand against the wall. After a moment, she gets your height.

“5’8””

“What?! But I’ve been 6’ for two years now!” You say. Yuri gained 4 inches, and you somehow lost 4 inches. Before any of you could say anything more, Monika and Sayori walk in.

“Sorry we’re late, we… uh, what are you guys doing?” Monika asked, seeing you three in the corner of the class.

“Ooh, are we measuring each other?” Sayori innocently asks. You, Natsuki and Yuri all exchange looks, before Yuri surprisingly spoke up.

“Well… not exactly.” She said, slightly confusing the two girls before you three began to explain the situation.
151.title: Shrink and grow.

choices: Hang out with Natsuki. She seemed to want something. (Reserved)
Hang out with Yuri, trying to comfort her through this.
Hang out with Monika or Sayori.
1513.content:
Monika and Sayori had listened with interest about the situation at hand. While Monika had a look of concern, Sayori was more curious about the development. She walked over to you, seemingly comparing heights before sure smiled.

“Haha, it’s so strange being up to your nose now.” She giggled, putting her hand to the top of her head then moving it towards you, accidentally touching your nose with it. “Eep!” She cried out, seeming to receive the same shock that Yuri had received earlier. “Owie…” She moaned, rubbing her hand.

“Sayori?” Monika began, concerned. “You’re… taller.” She slowly spoke. Upon hearing this, Sayori turned towards her, seeing that she was now eye level with the 5’6”club president, meaning she just grew 2 inches. Sayori gasped.

“Oh my gosh, we’re the same height!” She exclaimed, enveloping Monika in a hug.

“Sayori, come on, this is serious.” You speak up, getting her attention.

“Oh, right. Eheh…” she said, letting go of Monika and bridging her fingers. “Sorry.”

“Do you at least feel alright?” Monika asked you, which you say that you’re fine. “I see, and it looks like if we touch you, we grow a bit too.” She noted.

“Unfortunately…” Yuri mumbled. Natsuki on the other hand almost looked jealous, seeing that Sayori and Yuri were both taller now. She looked towards you, seemingly contemplating what she should do.

“Natsuki?” You got her attention, catching her staring. A small blush appeared as she turned her face away.

“Well, I feel as though it’ll be best to call the club off early today, just to try and understand this situation a bit better. You guys can head home if you want, just maybe try not to draw attention to yourselves from the other students.” Monika said, as you all agree. You take a glance at the girls, thinking of what to do.
1513.title: Monika, worried about the situation, calls the ...

choices: Suddenly, there's a knock at the door.
15131.content:
Natsuki seemed concerned about something. Maybe it’d be best to see what’s wrong, if anything.

“Hey Nat.” You called out to the small girl, getting her attention.

“Huh? Wait, don’t call me Nat!” She complained, making you chuckle. Good to know that she’s still the same as ever, despite the situation.

“Is everything alright, it looked like something was bothering you earlier.

“What? Oh…” She looked away, realizing what you were talking about. “Um… it’s… stupid. Don’t worry about it.”

“I doubt that. Remember that I’m willing to help you in any way I can.” Saying this made her fidget some. You’d like to think you were at least close to her, considering you’ve spent a lot of time with her.

“Uuu… f-fine.” She relented. “But… can we talk about it at your place?”

“Sure.” You respond. After saying your goodbyes to the other girls (and receiving some slight teasing from Sayori) you and Natsuki head for you house. After making yourselves comfortable, Natsuki sits on the couch with you. “So. What’s on your mind?” You ask, making her look away, a small blush appearing on her face.

“I-it’s stupid, but… can you… make me taller?”

“… what?”

“W-what? Don’t look at me like that!” She pouted. “It’s just… I got jealous that Yuri and Sayori got taller. Like they need it.” She said, smirking despite herself. “I just… wanted to ask. You don’t have to if you don’t… want to.” She said, a frown making itself known. You got what she was getting at. She was the shortest of the club at 4’11”. You looked at, she was looking away, her face conflicted. You did want to see her happy, plus, was there really any harm in doing so?

“Sure, Nat.” You smile at her surprise.

“W-what? But-are you sure?” She asked, you couldn’t help but appreciate how much kinder she’s been as of late, not that you didn’t like her ‘tsundere’ side.

“Yeah, I mean, there doesn’t seem to be anything wrong with it. I don’t feel any different, Yuri, aside from seeming to become a little more shy, seems perfectly fine, so does Sayori. So why not?” You shrug, Natsuki beams at this.

“…T-thanks.” She says, struggling to get the words out, blushing and smiling. You both stand up which Natsuki noticed something. “Did you get smaller again?” She asked. You did notice that you didn’t have to look as far down as before.

“… I guess I did.” You say.

“Sheesh, if this keeps up, you’ll be as tiny as me!” She laughs. You didn’t know how to feel about that notion. It would certainly be something new.

“Yeah yeah, just give me your hand.” You say, shaking your head. Enthusiastically. She stretches out her arm, and you tap your finger onto her hand, giving her a shock.

“Ouch! You jerk!”

“What?! You knew that was coming!” You retort at her outburst. You two stand there for a second before laughing with each other.

“Yeah yeah, I guess.” She admits, before looking back up at you, not having to look so far up now. “Anyway, how tall do you think I am now?” She asked. She was way more excited than you had anticipated.

“Well, let’s go measure and find out.” You say, going to look for a tape measure.
15131.title: Hang out with Natsuki. She seemed to want somet...

info.brief_description: The girls of Doki Doki are put into different size related scenarios.
info.description:
The girls of Doki Doki Literature Club start growing. How will they take this new situation?

-Don't make things too sexual.

-Don't change the size of the characters to quickly.

-Keep all the girls gentle, no killing. I know how the game goes, but still.

-Not every chapter has to be about the girls growing, instead, try to develop a story as well. Have them react to and adapt to their changes.

-No nudity, the girls have to be wearing something at all times.

-Keep all the girls in character (Monika can be love "crazy" for you, but not obsessed).

-Write in second person.

-Write at least 2 paragraphs when adding.

-No other characters aside from you and the girls.

-If anyone shrinks, then no more than 8 inches tall.

-Main character is always male. (Sorry about that to anyone who wanted a girl.)
